comment.author: 77788549@N05
comment._content: James Rhodes Akam was born in 1893 in Bradford. A timber merchant, (Johnson and Akam Timber Merchants?), he originally enlisted in the ranks of 16th Battalion West Yorkshire Regiment (Prince of Wales's Own) (1st Bradford Pals), he is listed on their original strength of 1,000 men on 16th November 1914. He was commissioned and appointed as a Temporary Second Lieutenant in 18th Battalion West Yorkshire Regiment (Prince of Wales's Own) (2nd Bradford Pals) with effect 15th March 1915. [Published in the London Gazette of 27th April 1915]. James Rhodes Akam is listed as having arrived in New York off a passenger liner, aged 20, in 1913. www.ellisisland.org/search/matchMore.asp?kind=exact&F...
